title: Select All Rows
description: Write a query to select all rows from the table employees.

title: Select Specific Columns
description: Select only name and salary columns from employees.

title: Filter Using WHERE
description: Select employees whose age is greater than 25.

title: Sort Results
description: Select all employees and sort them by salary ascending.
examples: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary ASC;
solution: SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary ASC;

title: Count Rows
description: Count the total number of employees.

title: Remove Duplicate Values
description: Select unique job titles from employees.

title: Find Highest Salary
description: Return the maximum salary from the employees table.

title: Search Using LIKE
description: Select employees whose name starts with 'A'.
examples: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';

title: Filter Using BETWEEN
description: Select employees with salary between 30000 and 50000.
examples: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary BETWEEN 30000 AND 50000;
solution: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary BETWEEN 30000 AND 50000;
